snippet: Ed Miliband’s two-ton limestone tablet engraved with his party’s pledges to the electorate — known as the “Ed Stone” — has disappeared. The British news media is hot on its trail.
abstract: British news media is seeking whereabouts of missing 'Ed Stone,' two-ton stone tablet with promises to electorate by defeated Labour Party leader Ed Miliband carved into it.
lead_paragraph: Ed Miliband’s two-ton limestone tablet engraved with his party’s pledges to the electorate — known as the “Ed Stone” — has disappeared. The British news media is hot on its trail.

headline.main: British Press on the Hunt for Labour Leader’s Missing ‘Ed Stone’
headline.print_headline: No Stone Left Unturned in Hunt for Labour Party Artifact
